title: Hoping to Go to The Mid South Next Year? Here’s a ‘Mega’ Way to Get There
content:
The Mega Mid South is a new bikepacking route based out of Stillwater, Oklahoma. Doing the grand départ in September guarantees you entry to the 2025 gravel race.

Read the full article at Hoping to Go to The Mid South Next Year? Here’s a ‘Mega’ Way to Get There on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
